attributes.action: Ban a lender from requiring any customer to pay the lender's legal fees.
attributes.additional_details:
It is current practise for corporate lenders to pass on their  legal fees and in consequence there is no effective control of them. Some key lists contain few solicitors and so there is an increasing liklihood of duplication of work and fees.

The fees would  be dramatically reduced  by a change. It is an extraordinary anachronism.
